00019         extern int _s_vb_tabs;

00021         struct _vb_tabber
00022         {
00023                 _vb_tabber() { ++_s_vb_tabs; }
00024                 ~_vb_tabber() { --_s_vb_tabs; }
00025         };
00026 
00027         #define VERBOSE(str, ...)\
00028         _vb_tabber __tabber;\
00029         for(int i = 0; i < _s_vb_tabs; ++i) printf("  ");\
00030         printf(str, ## __VA_ARGS__);\
00031         printf("\n");

00037         #define THREAD_ANY_USER() ASSERT_STRICT(boost::this_thread::get_id() != fwk_thread_id)

00039         #define THREAD_FRAMEWORK() ASSERT_STRICT(boost::this_thread::get_id() == fwk_thread_id)
